SELECT count(1) FROM site_info si, site_link sl, site_link_data sld WHERE si.site_srl = sl.site_srl AND sl.link_srl = sld.link_srl AND sl.use_yn = 'Y'
AND sld.data_title like CONCAT('%', #{item} ,'%')

SELECT si.site_nm , sld.data_title , sld.data_link , sld.data_img , sld.data_content , sld.reg_dt FROM site_info si, site_link sl, site_link_data sld WHERE si.site_srl = sl.site_srl AND sl.link_srl = sld.link_srl AND sl.use_yn = 'Y'
AND sld.data_title like CONCAT('%', #{item} ,'%')
ORDER BY data_srl DESC
LIMIT #{rowStart}, #{rowSize}
